website_summaries.verdict: If you need a simple yet reliable laptop for surfing the internet or binging your favorite streaming service during long trips, the Chromebook 3 is worth your consideration.
pros: Up to 11 hours on a single charge

customer_reviews.title: Great school laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a low cost laptop especially for college
customer_reviews.author: BertchTREE

customer_reviews.title: Great compact little machine.
customer_reviews.text: Chrome is so easy, and this Chromebook seems to be a perfect device. Fits comfortably on your lap without tipping, the ease of transferring everything from your previous Chromebook is a snap. Happy I bought a second Chrombook!
customer_reviews.author: Lally

customer_reviews.title: Practical. Affordable. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Chromebook when they first came out. I knew exactly what a Chromebook is for. It is NOT a laptop. The 11 inch screen is larger than most tablets. I can't stand tablets/touchscreen. I prefer a keyboard and touchpad. Very pleased with the quality of this Samsung. It is not fancy. It gets the job done. No complaints. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MARIAH DENN

customer_reviews.title: My mother-in-law loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've bought for my mother-in-law. (She wore the first one out.) :-) No need for fancy features; she uses it for email, Facebook, and Solitaire. She absolutely loves it. It does only what she needs, and it doesn't take up much room on her desk.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Larson

customer_reviews.title: replacement for my laptop that died
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and so far so good. It lacks microsoft and capabilities of my recently dead laptop. I bought this as a temporary substitute. I'm in the process of booking a flight to Frankfurt Germany and need internet access. Only used for 1 1/2 hours so far. Hence the 4 star rating. For the price, hard to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: The Kilted Rogue

customer_reviews.title: This computer is sloooow!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for (I paid $159). With a Chromebook, you think you know what you're getting, a computer that is nothing more than a basic browser. What is there that could make it slow? I don't know, but this computer is as slow as some of my PC's loaded down with software. Do yourself a favor, you can get a much better Chromebook for not much more money.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Worth $155 very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 11 year old just for internet this is not a good computer for work etc.... Really nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rocci

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is small and is convenient to use
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Get the 4gb
customer_reviews.text: 2gb of ram is not enough anymore. 4 is the neelw standard as the 2gb slugged its way to open and keep a meager 4 processes running simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Coast matches quality. It's still a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. But what's new? The 2GB of RAM in this is barely sufficient to do Facebook, YouTube, and Gmail at the same time.... But if you only need to do those three things and nothing more, why spend more? The picture quality on this laptop is also a "C+" in my book. Kinda not as good as I expected laptops to look nowadays. Like I said though.... The price on this and everything that it does do makes it still a good purchase in my book. The battery life and actual weight of the laptop are exceptional for portability.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pesu

customer_reviews.title: excellent for mild use
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my girlfriend after her old laptops hinge busted on the corner and the screen completely came off. this one we've been using for a good 6 months so far and the only problems i can see coming up are occasional lagging, the camera works as well as you would expect for a laptop of this price, and the color quality on the graphics themselves are acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Skyrm

customer_reviews.title: Solid little laptop with great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook for a few reasons. First, I have wholly bought into the Google ecosystem and it made since to add this to my collection. Next, I needed something small and light I could throw in a backpack for business trips. Finally, I needed something reliable I could use for website editing and word processing. It checks all of these boxes very well. There are plenty of apps, and it is overall a snappy little machine. It isn't blazing fast, and if you are looking for anything more than browsing and word processing I'd recommend looking elsewhere. But if you just need a small laptop with great battery life for basic work functions, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Crashes over and over
customer_reviews.text: It's crashed 5 times since we got it in May, 2 1/2 months ago. I've used the recovery app more than my wife has used the Chromebook. I ended up getting her a Windows Acer laptop. I either got a lemon, or these things aren't ready for prime time. I keep getting the OS is corrupted message and have to reboot from a flash drive where I downloaded a recovery boot image from Chrome's recovery app. Takes about 30 mins each time it crashes. Right now it's out of commission because I'm not sure I want to recover again just to see it crash.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Chromebooks are true computers...
customer_reviews.text: u dun need that much of ram of 1TB. it is just that macrohard win win so handicapped that it needs 500GB to run flash and YouTube. for 4GB ram and HDD 32GB Chrome OS runs way much faster than 8 GB ram HDD 512GB win win machine. Samsung chromebook pros: wise, brilliant, fast, well and practically built, colorful, well poised hifi sound... cons: screen could be bigger, but that was my problem. i made a wrong choice and underate the diameters of the screensize. will buy a 15.6 inch model...
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Computer won't charge
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a review stating that the charger was broken less than 2 months after purchase. I bought a new charger and now it appears that it is the computer that won't pick up the charge. So basically my daughter used the computer for less than 2 months and now it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The storage fills up very quickly and it will get all glitchy but other than that it is the best you can get at that price point
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for school
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my oldest son, 9 years old, for Christmas and he loves it. It works for school stuff and fun. I like that I can monitor his usage and online time as well as having to authorize any purchases or downloads.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this. It's a little sluggish sometimes, but it's not a big deal. The battery life is fantastic and this does everything I need it to do: web browsing, Google docs, a few apps. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for my money! The perfect little laptop to take to the coffee shop, library, and use around the house. Lightweight and great for basic, everyday use - internet surfing, email, streaming audio & video, creating simple documents, amazing battery life, & super lightweight! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Christine

customer_reviews.title: small compact computer that packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: this small compct samsung is great for everyone you dont have to be a computer whiz,paying bills doingyour banking or just lookingup iformation good little computer tohave built in protection that protects your information.
customer_reviews.author: angela carter

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for my child. This is what they will be doing their work on in school in middle and high school. Speed is okay for what we need it for right now. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: favorite laptop for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer this is my second chrome book that I bought from Amazon it has great battery life and is small and compact to travel or use it for school a lot it has a long battery life and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Needs wifi to umsetup and use.
customer_reviews.text: Very good compact laptop for those wanting an easy to carry around computer. No complaints so far. I bought the chromebook because I was hoping to link it to my Straight Talk s7 but it has to have wifi. So I'm a little bit disappointed but otherwise great for price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Loewen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for both my girls. They are the perfect size and easy to use for little ones who need to do computer homework. Even my husband will borrow it for his personal use because it is very convenient and speed is great. Only thing is that they seem to be different versions since the displays are different.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Entry level tab
customer_reviews.text: My first thought has been that for the money spent it was a good deal, however what I’m finding out that it’s not touch screen and it lags so ram isn’t that great it really is a basic chrome book. I got this for my kids that like to play games like roblox and they have better luck using an iPad, we also recently got a wireless printer and it doesn’t seem to be compatible with it.
customer_reviews.author: nate castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: denise bailey

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT AND CUSTOMER SERVOCE
customer_reviews.text: This product and cheap and unreliable. It broke within 2 weeks, and after an hour of trying to get service for it, I was told I would be paying for the repairs. WORST customer service and TERRIBLE product. CHEAP, UNRELIABLE, SLOW. NOT WORTH A DIME.
customer_reviews.author: Martha A Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is a great price and purchase! Still works and would buy electronics through Amazon any day. Can be trusted
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Fragoso

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I’d recommend?
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for fourth grader to school at home. After a week, however, the mic went out and could not be resolved. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Big Reader

customer_reviews.title: Want partial refund from 3rd party vender
customer_reviews.text: Received chrome book 3 on 3/30/20. Video ability is not working. Due to covid 19 my grandson needs this computer for school. Would like a partial refund since returning it is not an option. All his school programs have been downloaded
customer_reviews.author: carol paver

customer_reviews.title: Charging is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the cord because the one that came with the chrome book didn’t always charge. The new cord has the same issue. It isn’t the cord the issue is the chrome book connection. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschooling my two daughters
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic approaching I ordered two of these as our local school system set up for at home study using a partial online interface. Both arrived as promised and have suited this purpose exactly as expected. Battery life is more than adequate for the 6 hours a day they spend using them. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FXC

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Just turned it on it froze and it went power off
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck for non-tech Savvy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for an elder and they found it super simple and easy to use even for the not computer savvy
customer_reviews.author: Comrad55

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints with this product! Easy to set up and use. The battery life is amazing and cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift. I don't think if there's any problem with it, the person never says otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chromebook for Christmas for my daughter to access Google classroom at home. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Presley's Mommie

customer_reviews.title: a great machine for ssh and vnc
customer_reviews.text: i use this to work on my home pc and its perfect, cheap enough i can spill drinks on it
customer_reviews.author: Vince Coghlan

customer_reviews.title: The O button didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: There is clearly no quality control the o button doesn't work and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Deina

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your Windows laptop.
customer_reviews.text: There are only a few new tricks to learn to walk away from MircoSoft. It has worked flawlessly. Better then Android
customer_reviews.author: Monte See

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: For the money - this was best deal we could find and has not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughters 8th birthday. Charged and ready to go overnight. Seems to work perfectly. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 for my kids. They love them. No issues and had them for about 5 months now. Also both kids are super clumsy and dropped them a couple times and no scratch’s and still works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Horrid, and supremely underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Samsung should stick to making phones and tablets and not in the Chromebook market. This computer was vastly underwhelming and not even up to the specs as advertised! (Quoted 4gb RAM, then mysteriously changed to 2 GB RAM when my purchase arrived.) Thoroughly unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Pancake Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My kids needed a device to do their homework on I had to buy two and they love them
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Don Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer!
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size of this Chromebook! It fits easily into my bag, and is super light weight. The picture quality isn't amazing, but it's good. I only use it for basic functions, nothing with pictures or gaming, or anything like that, so I don't mind. The battery life is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Schweiner

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is perfect for my son, picture quality has been excellent and the laptop works very well overall. The speed is a little slower than what we are accustomed too. I plan on purchasing a 15 inch soon because that will be easier on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/Wife/Loving Life

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a nine year old. Works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Missing OS or damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received early yay but when I turn on says missing os or damaged now what do I do!?! Followed prompts to fix issue still not working very disappointed this was for my son’s distant learning. We had to borrow a 2nd laptop from school in meantime
customer_reviews.author: Ckelekaz

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done for very basic internet use and the google suite
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use it for basic word processing. Streaming has very poor quality but that is not an important function for me. I really like the night light, the ease of wifi connection, and the bluetooth connectivity. For the most part, the machine works well and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: JonathanG

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with order process
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my product. Love it. I was not happy with the order and shipping process and the ability to get answers from Customer service.
customer_reviews.author: diane stone

customer_reviews.title: Power Cable is Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We've had this chromebook for 1 month and the power cable just broke. The actual pin connection was very delicate/flimsy from day one and presented a problem with keeping the cable connected properly. It is a poorly engineered cable and port connection.
customer_reviews.author: b3nj3t

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for grandchildren. They love them and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for emails and spreadsheets, especially if you have a gmail account and use Google docs, sheets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a couple of weeks ago for my kids. It is perfect for them. They are able to complete school work and participate in zoom meetings without any hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: jason anton

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine. Package arrived ok and on time as promised. Im happy with my Chromebook. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Computer lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The computer crapped out a day before the servicing on this computer expired. Is there any type of warranty? I hardly used it because it was slow to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: PeskiAnn

customer_reviews.title: For youth school work it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it and uses it for school
customer_reviews.author: Bull

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Wait
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. It kept cutting off when you moved it in any way. I had to get my money back quick!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My 1st Grader loves this. He does all his school work on it and it seems to be working fine
customer_reviews.author: David Benjamin Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: got this for my daughter for Christmas I'm very impressed with it. New condition. Perfect size for her
customer_reviews.author: marie harms

customer_reviews.title: Cheap money wise, excellent quality computer.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this chrome book, it is the most easy to use computer I have ever owned. Pretty good battery life and pretty easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Agbayani

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED TO BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she loves this item it is quick and light. If you need a cheap laptop buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this for my brother. He was in need of something to travel with him. I've owned one for 5 yrs with no problems !
customer_reviews.author: Easttxmeemaw

customer_reviews.title: Great for College students!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Arrived on time, great price and Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for College students.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid laptop for a great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set and perfect for my children to use for homeschool. The only downside is that the screen is not the brightest when they are doing their work at night
customer_reviews.author: Joely C.

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life and the price make it the best laptop ever.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi A.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Runs out of memory often, this was good for a pinch, but not for a long time of use
customer_reviews.author: weezrboo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps crashing and freezing
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this laptop, it's essentially unusable for us because it freezes and crashes so often
customer_reviews.author: Julia G. Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chromebook 3 as a gift, mostly used to get into social media, email, and some video streaming and has worked perfectly. No complains as of today.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my sons, and they are not gentle creatures. The chromebooks seem to be holding up so far!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: All Good !
customer_reviews.text: Product arrives and functions as expected . Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.author: monica morales

customer_reviews.title: just started using
customer_reviews.text: We just got this and so far it has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Item and Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend and it works great. 10/10 would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Mason W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for school. Very durable and practical.
customer_reviews.author: diverscity

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great! My daughter loves it, and uses it for everything! Good price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Price

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Very very slow piece of garbage. Everything takes forever to open.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great school computer for the kids
customer_reviews.text: It is great for a school computer for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Niece for my kids and school projects. I like that you can use Google Play on it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff slaughter
